pages.text:
[9.02]-1 
City of Gresham Development Code 
 
(01/2023) 
SECTION 9.0200 
CLEAR VISION AREA 
General 
9.0201  Street and Railroad Clear Vision Area   
9.0202  Driveway Clear Vision Area  
General 
9.0201  Street and Railroad Clear Vision Area   
A clear-vision area shall be maintained on each corner of property at the intersection of two streets or a street 
and a railroad. The clear vision area is triangular and extends to the curb of the intersecting street, restricting 
sight obstructions in the right of way as well as on a private property. The dimensions of the clear vision area 
and exceptions area described in the Public Works Standards (6.04).  
9.0202  Driveway Clear Vision Area  
All driveways and service drives to public streets shall provide clear vision areas on both sides of the 
driveway or service drive. The dimensions of the clear vision area and exceptions are described in the Public 
Works Standards (6.04).
